Ivory Tower Wizard Valleria:
A Grand Medal of Honor can only be obtained by whoever uses the Soul Quartz to Summon Moricks from the Soul Summon Stone. Great power has been used on the Soul Quartz to bind it with the Moricks' soul, so it's different from the other monsters.
1 Grand Medal of Honor can be exchanged for 1000 Faction Amity Points. Clans you can choose from are the A Blackbird Clan, Mother Tree Guardians, Giant Trackers, Unworldly Visitors and Kingdom's Royal Guard.
Which clan would you like to choose? You cannot reselect, so please choos carefully.
